full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAS MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYI GSOL 'DEBS BYAMS PA CHEN PO MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES MKHAS MANG 'DU BA'I BSTI GNAS SER THEG CHEN GLING GI GYES PA GRVA TSANG GI SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE SMRA BA'I SENGGE BYAMS PA SMON LAM GYI SPRUL SKU PAndI TA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS DPAL BZANG PO'I GSOL 'DEBS ZHABS BRTAN DANG BCAS PA MI 'GYUR RAB BRTAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GDUL GYA'I SNANG DOR BSNYUN PA'I TSUL BSTAN PA'I TSE ZHABS BRTAN DU DMIGS NAS LHAG BSAM DAG PA LA BSKUL TE DZA YA PAndI TA 'PHRIN MAS KYIS GO BDE BAR SBYAR BA'O, ,)
